While using continuous development of CARBON DIOXIDE IS RED-HOT refrigeration technology and warm pump technology, CO2 compressors are also greatly developed, and related manufacturers in your house and abroad have successively created CO2 compressors. It is just not easy to choose a fantastic CO2 compressor from a great number of manufacturers. When you get it, you should also take note of the maintenance of CARBON DIOXIDE compressor.

Maintenance connected with mechanical condition of CARBON DIOXIDE compressor unit
Vibration

Should the turbine is started, its found that the vibration benefit is high, that is definitely, the speed is stopped and the cause is checked. If the cause does not is very much caused by an the wrong type of operation, such as a great improper temperature rise, stop and check all the tests described in the particular table below. The vibration degree suddenly increases during usual operation, reducing the fill and/or downtime. In so of increasing amplitude, take a look at the phenomenon and change the operating conditions pertaining to analysis. If the unit vibration is beyond their budget, the cause should be found as well as the corresponding treatment should be performed.

CO2 compressor

Unusually high sound

The inspection must be carried out carefully below low-speed operating conditions. Following a speed increase, the sound is mixed using the sound of the rotating sound and the noise entering the steam. Therefore, it is difficult to find the sound source. The abnormal sound is often associated with the vibration, so the sound need to be checked.,find the true reason, and deal from it accordingly.



Increased bearing temperature

The increase in bearing temperature is because of bearing metal damage, reduced number of lubricating oil, low lubricating essential oil pressure, high lubricating petrol supply temperature, high rotor vibration worth, and abnormal thrust. If the bearing metal temperature abruptly rises or exceeds 125°C, quit and check the having and perform the similar treatment.



Bearing temperature fluctuation

Individual bearing temperature fluctuations, please check accents you want in the table. After checking the different items, the temperature fluctuations should nevertheless be stopped and the corresponding treatment should be carried out.



Maintenance connected with process system for CARBON DIOXIDE IS HOT compressor unit
The inlet and wall plug pressures and temperatures of each section of the unit need to be closely monitored to prevent the system from entering the spike condition. At the very same time, the unit can be prohibited from over-temperature as well as over-pressure operation, resulting throughout equipment damage or health and safety valve take-off;

During the actual inspection, it should be noted the output valve position belonging to the anti-surge controller should be consistent with the on-site valve position;

Take note of monitoring whether the temperature and pressure belonging to the main steam of the turbine are within the normal range;



Normal maintenance of the unit shaft seal condensing procedure
Check that the U-shaped water seal guides water to flow out;

Find out if the vacuum of your condenser is normal;



Typical operation
Turn the start switch on the standby pump to the “STOP” position, and reserve the pump to confirm the traditional condition;

Confirm that the inlet and outlet valves with the backup pump are fully open, start the standby pump motor, and confirm that the standby pump is performing normally;

After the standby knock out outlet pressure is secure, stop the main pump. If it is essential to repair, the pump shall be cut off after electricity off. If no maintenance is necessary, the pump switch is actually automatically placed.

Opening the exhaust valve in the standby device;

Open your communication valve and vent the spare equipment;

Maintain the exhaust state with regard to 10min, warm up the actual spare equipment, avoid the oil heat change and cause shock into the unit

Close the wear valve and equalize this backup equipment;

Move the switching handle within the correct direction (for that alternate oil cooler, the cooling water really should be used first), and make use of the spare equipment;

Close the communication control device and open the exhaust valve with the cutting device to minimize pressure;



If you have purchased other machines such as oxygen compressors, hydrogen compressors, or anything else.,don’t forget to accomplish the maintenance on weekdays, which will save you big money.
